title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: An authentic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, cured pork, and black pepper.
instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti in salted water.
2. In a separate pan, fry the guanciale until crispy.
3. In a bowl, whisk the eggs, cheese, and pepper.
4. Drain the spaghetti, reserving pasta water. Add to the pan with the guanciale.
5. Remove from heat and stir in the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce.
6. Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry packed with fresh vegetables for a perfect weeknight meal.
instructions:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cornstarch, and vegetable broth.
2. Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic and onion and stir-fry until fragrant.
3. Add the vegetables and cook for 3-5 minutes until tender-crisp.
4. Pour in the sauce mixture and cook until thickened.
5. Serve immediately over rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: A timeless classic. These cookies are chewy in the center with crispy edges and loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F and line a baking sheet.
2. In a large bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto the baking sheet.
6. Bake for 9-11 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
